content: ready to take your sock game to the next level our free textured socks pattern by andrea yetman is the perfect way to do just that perfect for beginners this pattern is quick to knit up and adds the perfect touch of texture that ll keep your feet on-trend and oh-so-cozy these socks are worked from the cuff down with an easily memorized yet engaging stitch pattern consisting of knitting purling and slipped stitches **yarn** patricknits - bis-sock 85% merino/15% nylon 400m 100 g color cherry pie **needle and notions** 32 circular needles for knitting magic loop or 9-inch circulars in 2 25mm tapestry needle stitch markers **size** one size length of foot adjustable **gauge** 36sts = 10 cm 4 in
